com.gcu.business

Class UserBusinessService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gcu.business.UserBusinessService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserBusinessInterface

    public class UserBusinessService
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserBusinessInterface
    This is the business service for the User model, all the logic that connects the controller and the database is used in here.
    Author:
    Hermes Mimini

      java.lang.Boolean validateUsers(Credentials user)
